bio:
Bergritte Battle-Born is an elderly Nord woman who resides in Whiterun.
She is a member of the Battle-Born clan and is married to Olfrid, the patriarch of the clan. Alfhild is Bergritte's daughter. Alfhild is married to Idolaf. Lars is Idolaf and Alfhild’s son, and Bergritte’s grandson. 
As family elder, Bergritte lives a relatively anonymous existence in Whiterun. Her daughter Alfhild reads to her sometimes during the evening. 
Bergritte’s clan is currently in a heated feud with the Gray-Mane clan, another prominent family in Whiterun.
Quote:
"There's a rift here in Skyrim, and can't neither magic nor the passin' of time make it right."
"Lars, dear, why don't you go outside and play? It's a beautiful day."
"Can you believe those pathetic Gray-Manes still show their faces in public?"
"There was love between our families. For generations. Now, there is only enmity."
If the Stormcloaks have taken control of Whiterun: "It's a miracle these Stormcloaks haven't robbed us blind yet. I'm sure it's only a matter of time."
name: Bergritte Battle-Born
